notes: Modern apartment in a 15-floor building with recessed lighting, built-in ceiling AC, clean white tile floors, LG refrigerator, and an intercom/video doorphone system. The living room has sliding glass doors to a balcony which would need baby-proofing; the kitchen has a breakfast bar with tall bar stools that are unstable for a child. The space appears clean and well-maintained but the listing description is minimal (just an agent ad), and with only 5 photos showing mainly the kitchen/entry/living room, the bedroom and bathroom are not shown â€” would need to verify full layout and condition in person.
